text: The Republic of Karelia, or Karelia,Karelia is a republic of Russia in Northern Europe. The republic is a part of the Northwestern Federal District, and with area of , bordering Finland. Republic of Karelia have around 650 thousand residents. Its capital is Petrozavodsk. == References == Category:Republics of Russia Category:1991 establishments in Europe Category:Karelia
title: Republic of Karelia
